tool.name: OpenNLP Part-of-Speech Tagger
tool.help:
**What it does**
Detects the sentences in a text using Regular Expressions and a set of simple rules, using the `OpenNLP <https://opennlp.apache.org>`_ POS tagger (see the `OpenNLP -- Finding Parts of Speech Tutorial <https://www.tutorialspoint.com/opennlp/opennlp_finding_parts_of_speech.htm>`_ for more information).
**Required annotations**
* `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ (LIF)
**Generated annotations**
* A LIF document with a new view containing `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ annotations, to which a "pos" feature has been added indicating the token's part of speech (`Penn tagset <https://www.ling.upenn.edu/courses/Fall_2003/ling001/penn_treebank_pos.html>`_).
